Compiler: clang installed recently via `brew install llvm`
Machine:  macOS v10.15.4 Catalina
configure script:
```
./configure --enable-fuzz --with-sanitizers=fuzzer,address,undefined --disable-asm
```


Offending line:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/7f609f68d835bece8b01da1b09b127c67769ae7d/src/logging.cpp#L245
title: fuzz: ASAN complaint on macOS with -fsanitize=fuzzer,address,undefined
